column1: #Text=" Fire Sage says : " Hail Fire Lord Ozai !

#Text=" Main Azula ( flashback only ) Gansu Lee Sela Ursa ( flashback only ) Zuko Antagonists Gow says : " Minor Azulon ( flashback only ) Iroh ( flashback only ) Mai ( flashback only ) Ozai ( flashback only ) Than Ty Lee ( flashback only ) Ying " Katara says : " Those clouds look so soft , do n't they ?
#Text=Like you could just jump down and you 'd land in a big , soft , cottony heap ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe you should give it a try .
